actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

actions.subcommittee: SBA Legislation and the General Economy
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on SBA Legislation and the General Economy

official_title: To waive certain requirement under the Small Business Act for disaster relief assistance.

summary.text: Entitles certain regulated public utility companies and interstate transportation providers operating in areas affected by Hurricanes Andrew or Iniki or Typhoon Omar to apply for and receive disaster assistance loans under appropriate provisions of the Small Business Act without regard to: (1) the size of the qualifying business; (2) the availability of non-Federal sources of credit; or (3) the maximum amount of assistance established under such provisions or related regulations.

titles.title: To waive certain requirement under the Small Business Act for disaster relief assistance.
